text: (Abosome kronkron no a) yetu hyε da no ma boniayε yε nkͻsoͻ, εyera wͻn a wͻ’nnye nnie no: Wͻ’ma ho kwan afe (woi mu a), na wabra no afe (foforͻ mu) sεdeε wͻ’bεyε ama εne (abosome) dodoͻ a Nyankopͻn ayε no kronkron no ahyia, na wͻ’ama deε Nyankopͻn abra no ho kwan. Wͻn dwumadi bͻne no ayε wͻn fε. Onyankopͻn deε Ɔnkyerε nnipa boniayεfoͻ no kwan
